column5: Went out to a nearby stream after work today for an hour or so. There were a bunch of these little guys, but unfortunately im not experienced enough to properly ID this. What is it?    photo by dsukh, on Flickr
little rainbow trout it looks like. treat em with care so they can go larger
Awesome!  Used barbless hook, and fish never left water until he hopped right when I was talking the picture.  Haha, had a great time
Nice little Rainbow. You're likely to find a lot of them this time of year. But don't go telling many people where!
You really don't want to be targeting those fish, they are steelhead smolts...  Let them get big before you put hooks into them..
Haha agree, although I'm sure nobody intentionally targets smolts.
You give people way too much credit, lol.
Lol well hopefully that's the case anyways, now that I found the small ones hopefully I'll be able to find the bigger ones. New to fly fishing lol, any tips will much much appreciated (:
